author: Sam-Harper
body:
#### PR description:

This PR adds the phase-II HLT E/gamma debug producer by introducing a new class EgammaHLTPhaseIIExtraProducer which handles the Phase-II specific things such as HGCAL and L1 tracks so it doesnt have to be exposed to the standard EgammaHLTExtraProducer. 

It also introduces a new track trigger dataformat, L1TrackExtra which so far allows tracking of the refererences to the L1Track and its tracking particle. In this format it is significantly easier to use, particularly in fwlite.  The name could probably be better and I'm happy to rename it to anything else. L1TrackTruthPair for example. 

It also adds the rec-hit counts to the e/gamma HLT debug format as these are used in the regressions and thus need to be stored. 

Once https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/32910 is merged, then I'll submit the 11_1_X flavour

#### PR validation:

Used extensively for E/g HLT phase-II development. Test shows this produces the expected output
title: Extending E/gamma HLT Debug to phaseII and adding rec-hit counts: 11_3_X
